description:
Why Peter, you wouldn`t be thinking about throwing the match, right? Who Knows what could happen if your ill-advised plan to get rid of the Ogre sisters were to backfire...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Peter Grill e os Modos de Duelo
Peter Grill et la science du combat
Peter Grill to Kettou no Kokoroe
Peter Grill und die Kenntnisse eines Duells
ピーター・グリルと決闘の心得
